title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - CFP & Cristobal to The U, Dave Wannstedt on Tua Momentum, Big Ben Succession, Cowboys Achilles Heel
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - CFP & Cristobal to The U, Dave Wannstedt on Tua Momentum, Big Ben Succession, Cowboys Achilles Heel
description:
Colin rants on the advantage the NFL has over the other major sports (3:00), the teams that still have a playoff shot (4:00), why Tua has proven him both right and wrong (8:00), reports that Oregon HC Mario Cristobal could be headed to Miami (11:00), and the difficult truth college football fans need to accept about the CFB Playoff (13:00). Then FOX NFL analyst and former Bears & Dolphins HC Dave Wannstedt and Colin discuss the Ravens gutsy (and failed) 2-pt play (15:00), what the Steelers should do after Big Ben retires this season (16:00), why the Dolphins need a reality check with Tua (24:00), the changes the Bears need to make right now (26:00), "the elephant in the room" with the Cowboys (28:00), whether Dave would rather be coaching the Patriots or the Bills (30:00), their picks for best teams in the NFL (33:00), why Matthew Stafford has put the Rams in a vulnerable position (35:00), how college coaches can outstay their welcome (40:00), the key factor that might send Mario Cristobal to Miami (46:00), and great recruiting stories from Dave's college coaching days.

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
